LPP is a chronic, relapsing condition with periods of exacerbations (worsening symptoms) separated by periods of remission (a decrease in or disappearance of symptoms). Although the skin findings of LPP are usually not associated with any additional symptoms, some affected people may experience mild itching and/or burning or develop other features of lichen planus.
